ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
“…I was wearing these clothes.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“That's you, too.
You were so small then…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud} made up his memories
by listening to my stories…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“Did you imagine this sky?
No, you remembered it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {Tifa}
“That night the stars were gorgeous.
It was just {Cloud} and I.
We talked at the well…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“He remembered our promise too…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Tifa}
“That's why I kept thinking you
were the real {Cloud}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“I still believe you're
the {Cloud} from Nibelheim…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
“But you don't believe in yourself…”
